mapper.insert: insert into base_organize ( FUID , PARENTID , CODE , FULLNAME , LAYER , OUTERPHONE , INNERPHONE , MANAGER , DELETEMARK , ENABLED , SORTCODE , DESCRIPTION , ADDRESS , BUSINESSLICENSE , MANAGERID , POSSONOAPPLICARE , REGISTEREDCAPITAL , CONTACT , EMAIL , FAX , OPERATINGAREA , CREATEDATE , CREATEUSERID , CREATEUSERREALNAME , MODIFYDATE , MODIFYUSERID , MODIFYUSERREALNAME , ISCARGO , EMERGENCY ) values ( #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{outerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{innerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{deletemark,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{sortcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{businesslicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{managerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{possonoapplicare,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{operatingarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{iscargo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{emergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update base_organize
PARENTID=#{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
FULLNAME=#{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
LAYER=#{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
OUTERPHONE=#{outerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
INNERPHONE=#{innerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MANAGER=#{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DELETEMARK=#{deletemark,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
ENABLED=#{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
SORTCODE=#{sortcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ADDRESS=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
BUSINESSLICENSE=#{businesslicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MANAGERID=#{managerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
POSSONOAPPLICARE=#{possonoapplicare,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
REGISTEREDCAPITAL=#{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
CONTACT=#{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
EMAIL=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
FAX=#{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERATINGAREA=#{operatingarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
CREATEUSERID=#{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CREATEUSERREALNAME=#{createuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
MODIFYUSERID=#{modifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ISCARGO=#{iscargo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
EMERGENCY=#{emergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update base_organize set PARENTID=#{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , FULLNAME=#{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , LAYER=#{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , OUTERPHONE=#{outerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , INNERPHONE=#{innerphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MANAGER=#{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DELETEMARK=#{deletemark,jdbcType=INTEGER} , ENABLED=#{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} , SORTCODE=#{sortcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} , DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ADDRESS=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , BUSINESSLICENSE=#{businesslicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MANAGERID=#{managerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , POSSONOAPPLICARE=#{possonoapplicare,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REGISTEREDCAPITAL=#{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , CONTACT=#{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , EMAIL=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , FAX=#{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , OPERATINGAREA=#{operatingarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , CREATEUSERID=#{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEUSERREALNAME=#{createuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , MODIFYUSERID=#{modifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ISCARGO=#{iscargo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , EMERGENCY=#{emergency,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from base_organize where #{0} LIKE concat(cancat('%',#{1}),'%')
select fuid as id,fullname as text,parentid,layer from Base_Organize where DELETEMARK=0 and (fuid=#{departmentid} or layer>#{layer}) order by SortCode
